A rush of adrenaline engulfs you, reminding you of what you truly are now.
advancement.lifesteal:get_crystal_core.d: Silent screams come from the core, begging to be crafted into something greater.
The crystal shines brighter, tempting you to consume, but perhaps you could make it into something even greater?
advancement.lifesteal:use_totem_while_20: Save yourself from death with a Totem of Undying, even at the peak of immortality.
